title: Shawn Colvin
itunes:title: Shawn Colvin
description:
A veteran of the “fast folk” movement of the early ‘80s, singer-songwriter Shawn Colvin chanced into a gig as Suzanne Vega’s backup singer before signing to Columbia as a solo artist.

Her solo acoustic appearance on SNAP coincided with the release of her 1989 debut album, “Steady On.”
itunes:summary:
A veteran of the “fast folk” movement of the early ‘80s, singer-songwriter Shawn Colvin chanced into a gig as Suzanne Vega ’s backup singer before signing to Columbia as a solo artist. 
 Her solo acoustic appearance on SNAP coincided with the release of her 1989 debut album, “Steady On.”
media:description: Singer-songwriter Shawn Colvin dropped in on SNAP to play a handful of songs during the rounds for her 1989 solo debut, “Steady On.”
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW, Tricia Halloran)
itunes:author: KCRW, Tricia Halloran
content:encoded:
A veteran of the “fast folk” movement of the early ‘80s, singer-songwriter Shawn Colvin chanced into a gig as Suzanne Vega’s backup singer before signing to Columbia as a solo artist.

Her solo acoustic appearance on SNAP coincided with the release of her 1989 debut album, “Steady On.”
